Reviews.Title: Incorrect item received
Reviews.Author: BrownSuga43 "BrnSuga"
Reviews.Content: The item was nice but I received the wrong one compared to what was in the description.  I ordered the all white camera, but received a white one with black stripes on it.  I quickly returned it and received my refund very quickly.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.0-megapixel resolution for large, photo quality prints
3x optical zoom; 2.7-inch LCD screen with Micro Thumbnail View
Face Detection, Red-eye Removal and easy-to-use Blog mode
Successive movie function
50 MB built-in memory; capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Fuji FinePix Z30 10MP 3x Optical/5.7x Digital Zoom Camera (White) - FUJZ30WH
